title: Idol☆Sister
synopsis: Former members of the idol group IKB31, Ayaka Takano, Maki Kamii and Maina Ooizumi, form a new group called Platinum Kiss. One of the biggest reasons for their success onstage would be their manager, Ayaka's older brother, despite his perverted nature.
staff: [['Miura, Saburou', ['Director']], ['Ohtomo, Takuji', ['Original Creator']], ['Hong, Seok-pyo', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
